events.name: WordCamp Singapore 2016
events.description: Note: Please visit https://2016.singapore.wordcamp.org for the latest updates, and to purchase tickets. You will need to buy a ticket via our WordCamp site to attend. WordCamp Singapore is a community-organised WordPress conference that brings together bloggers, developers, designers, artists, small business owners, entrepreneurs, and educators from Singapore and all across Asia.
events.location: Microsoft Singapore, Auditorium, Level 21, One Marina Boulevard, Singapore 018989

events.name: How to Source, Build and Be Part of a Design Team
events.description:
RSVP for free here: bit.ly/2bagDaP

Join General Assembly and award-winning recruitment agency Xpand Group - Singapore at a sharing session to discover tips and tricks to building a robust design team and/or being part of a robust design team. 

This free event is catered toward hiring managers, company founders and UX designers where they'll pick up tips from industry leaders, improve their knowledge of design hiring tactics and connect with others.
events.location: Aviva Digital Garage - Singapore, 28 Armenian Street undefined

events.name: September meetup - docker in the cloud
events.description: September meetup! Place: PayPal office Talks19h15: a tale on bringing docker to GKE/Kubernetes (Vincent Serpoul)19h45: ECS - AWS EC2 Service (Kai Hendry)20h15: docker on Azure (Microsoft) SponsorVenue sponsor: PayPalFood sponsor: PayPal
events.location: PayPal office in Suntec, 5 Temasek Blvd, #09-01 Suntec Tower Five, 038985 Nearest Mrt:Promenade(Yellow Line), Singapore
